hero.title: Powerful Features for Modern Development
hero.description: Discover why Coders In Flow is the most advanced AI coding assistant available. Every feature is designed to make you more productive.

features.title: True Multi-Tasking Architecture
features.description: Run 20+ AI tasks simultaneously without any interference. Each task maintains its own context, model selection, and permissions - true parallel processing for lightning-fast development.
features: Complete task isolation with zero shared state
Parent-child task relationships with result aggregation

features.title: Intelligent Codebase Understanding
features.description: AI analyzes and documents your entire codebase on startup, creating a deep understanding that dramatically reduces token usage and improves response accuracy.

features.title: Shadow Git with Selective Staging
features.description: Perfect human-AI collaboration with our shadow git system. Review and selectively apply AI changes at the chunk level for complete control over your codebase.
features: Automatic git checkpoints after AI operations

features.title: Native Mobile Development
features.description: Continue coding on the go with our native iOS and Android apps. Full task management, real-time sync, and all the power of Coders In Flow in your pocket.

features.title: Advanced Context Management
features.description: Revolutionary context management with AI self-editing capabilities. The AI intelligently prunes unnecessary information in real-time, dramatically reducing costs.
features: Visual context editor for manual control

features.title: Enterprise Cloud & Team Management
features.description: Complete cloud synchronization with powerful team management capabilities. Monitor productivity, control access, and track ROI across your entire development team.

features.title: Dynamic Provider System
features.description: Unlike competitors with hardcoded providers, our JSON-based system allows instant provider addition without code changes. Add any AI provider in minutes.
features: 20+ AI providers out of the box
Add new providers via JSON configuration
Support for custom and local models

cta.title: Ready to Experience These Features?
cta.description: Join thousands of developers who are already coding faster with AI.
